1649400.name: Paranormal Detective: Escape from the 90s Demo
1649400.description:
The highly-anticipated sequel to “Paranormal Detective: Escape from the 80's”!

You're a detective who is a little too into the supernatural, and you've been tasked with tracking down a girl who went missing back in 1998 at the mall... possibly the arcade where her big sister worked.



Are you ready to investigate the old haunted arcade in an abandoned dead mall to try and find the missing girl??



The old machines still work, somehow. Play your favorite arcade classics like skee ball, air hockey, the claw game, pinball and more while you're solving crimes!









Explore the arcade, unlock hidden secrets, solve puzzles and play awesome retro 90’s arcade games in this VR escape room adventure!

Developer's Note: This is a demo/preview of "Paranormal Detective: Escape from the 90's"! You can play handful of games and puzzles to try out the experience, but this is not the full game. The game is still in development and the complete version will be released this fall.
Thanks for playing!
1649400.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
